ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName ="Distributed_List", ISCHANGED(Stage__c), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(Stage__c) ,"In Progress"), AND(NOT(ISPICKVAL( Stage__c, 'Qualification')), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Stage__c, 'Closed'))) )
